Disinfect skin.sentence: The nurse prepares the disinfectant solution.
Disinfect skin.subject: The nurse

Disinfect skin.sentence: The nurse cleans the skin area with soap and water.
Disinfect skin.subject: The nurse

Disinfect skin.sentence: The nurse dries the skin area using a sterile cloth.
Disinfect skin.subject: The nurse

Disinfect skin.sentence: The nurse applies the disinfectant solution to the skin area using a sterile applicator.
Disinfect skin.subject: The nurse
Disinfect skin.object: the disinfectant solution to the skin area

Disinfect skin.sentence: The nurse allows the disinfectant solution to air dry on the skin.
Disinfect skin.subject: The nurse
Disinfect skin.object: the disinfectant solution to air dry on the skin
